title: Screen Design:  "Radio Active Guardhouse," Reverse Side
medium: Black and color marking pens, brush and yellow gouache, graphite on white tracing paper
description: Four panel screen on wheels.  At left, a green panel with bunny-head cut out and, on top, a red dome with poles on either side, is attached at right to metal screen with red rectangle hanging on it.  The metal screen is connected at right to two sides of a guardhouse: one is blue and glass door (with no handle); the other is a yellow and red striped wall with window.
name: Drawing
